Equipment Actions.Action 1: Maul, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 31 Bludgeoning and can Stun
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Bolt, Ranged Spell Attack, Range: 600ft, Average Damage: 24 Acid, Cold, Fire, Force, Lightning, Radiant, or Thunder (choice, wtf)

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Empyrean can innately cast a bunch of spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Legendary Resistance, If the Empyrean fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance, The Empyrean has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Weapons, The Empyrean's weapon attacks are magical

Damage Immunities.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Attack, The Empyrean makes one attack
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Bolster, The Empyrean bolsters its allies.  Bolstered creatures can not be charmed or frightned, and gain advantage on ability checks and saving throws
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Trembling Strike, The Empyrean strikes the ground with its Maul, triggering an earth tremor.  All creatures on the ground make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone
